did.abstract: Principally love letters written during the Civil War to Hubert's future wife, Letitia Bailey. There are scattered references to a fight on the Potomac, 1861; the fall of New Orleans, 1862; a request for Letitia to make a "battle flag"; the town of Bryan, Tex.; and a reunion of Hood's Brigade, 1876. Also included is some correspondence of Hubbard's sisters.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Ben Hubert was a Confederate soldier, 6th Regiment, Louisiana Volunteers, and resident of Bryan (Brazos County), Texas.
